## QueryOptions type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type QueryOptions<
    TQueryFnData = unknown,
    TError = unknown,
    TData = TQueryFnData,
    TQueryKey extends QueryKey = QueryKey,
> = Omit<UseQueryOptions<TQueryFnData, TError, TData, TQueryKey>, 'queryKey' | 'queryFn'>;
```
